sub_title: Legal Designer🔮 | UX design Unicorn 🦄 | Full-stack developer 👩‍💻 | Legal tech 💻 | LegalOps 🛠️ | Prompting student 🤖 | Digital Accessibility
summary:
👩‍💼 Lawyer | Educator | Service & UX Designer | Co-founder @WOWLegalX ⚖️
Passionate about turning theory into action, I thrive in creating innovative experiences in the legal and justice sector. With +10 years of experience, including +8 years in legal tech and technology, I co-create better services and products alongside amazing teams.

📚 Background:
Law Degree | Master's in Business Management & Corporate Social Responsibility
Courses in UX design, service design, and full-stack web programming
Pursuing an international MBA in Project Management
🚀 Currently:
Design Ops & Legal Design Lead @WOWLegalExperience

💡 Let's connect and innovate together! Schedule a meeting ☕️ via the link on my profile or reach me at karol@wowlegalx.biz. Blog: https://wowlegalx.medium.com/

In this masterclass Karol Valencia, Legal Designer, explains some of these topics.

profile_positions.description:
1.Establish and maintain strategic partnerships and alliances with international organizations, governments, and key stakeholders.
2.Represent the organization at international conferences, events, and forums to promote collaboration and identify new opportunities.
3.Facilitate communication and cooperation between the organization and international partners, fostering strong relationships and driving global initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Ambassador of International Alliances

profile_positions.description:
1.Provide strategic guidance and advice to the organization, leveraging your expertise and industry knowledge.
2.Contribute to the development and implementation of key initiatives and programs, aligning with the organization's vision and goals.
3.Collaborate with other board members to review and assess organizational performance, ensuring effective governance and compliance.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
1.Develop and implement design operations strategies and processes to optimize efficiency and collaboration within the legal design team.
2.Lead and manage design projects, ensuring high-quality deliverables and adherence to timelines and budgets.
3.Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including legal, technology, and business stakeholders, to integrate design thinking into legal processes and initiatives.
profile_positions.title: Design Ops & Legal Design lead

profile_positions.description: I apply Legal Design to improve the experiences of users in the legal sector🔮 applying UX discipline, product management, technology and innovation. I help the team to be confortable to work providing tools, licenses and training workshops Coordination of the onboarding and off-boarding processes Budget and vesting processes Finnancial processes and payments Businness development Agile coach Scrum master in product design projects (legal tech)
profile_positions.title: Senior Legal Designer/Service Designer

profile_positions.description: Investor partner Co-founder Member of the advisory board
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board & Head of Legal Ops

profile_positions.description:
🙋Founder and team leader of WOW Legal Experience (Legal Design Agency), where:

🤓 We help: Law firms, Corporate and Governments.
⚖️ We create legal solutions that enable access to Justice.
👩🏽💻 Using technology, design and innovation.

How do we do it?
-We apply agile methodologies. 
-We analyze data, facts and evidence.
-We design behaviors based on Behavioral Science. 
-We have a multidisciplinary team and partners in the areas of: design, service design, development, engineers, processes, visual thinking, behavioral scientists and data scientists. 
-We are available in 5 languages: Spanish, English, French, German and Portuguese.
-We speak clearly and communicate everything transparently. 
-We are flexible and adapt to your needs.
profile_positions.title: Co-founder & CEO

profile_positions.description:
1.Lead and oversee the activities and initiatives of the Circle, promoting innovation and technology adoption within the legal sector.
2.Develop partnerships with industry stakeholders, organizations, and academic institutions to foster collaboration and knowledge exchange.
3.Organise events, workshops, and conferences to facilitate discussions on emerging trends, advancements, and best practices in legal technology.
profile_positions.title: Director of the Circle of Innovation and technology in the legal sector

profile_positions.description:
1.Design and deliver high-quality lectures and workshops on relevant legal topics, incorporating innovative teaching methods and materials.
2.Provide guidance and mentorship to students, fostering their professional and intellectual development.
3.Conduct research in the field of law, publish scholarly articles, and contribute to the academic community through conferences and seminars.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer

profile_positions.description:
1.Develop and implement design operations strategies to enhance the efficiency and effectiveness of the legal design team.
2.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate design thinking principles into legal processes and initiatives.
3.Lead the commission's projects and initiatives, ensuring the delivery of high-quality design solutions that meet client needs and objectives.
profile_positions.title: Head of the Legal design ops commission

profile_positions.description:
1.Provide strategic guidance and advice to the organization, leveraging your expertise and industry knowledge.
2.Contribute to the development and implementation of key initiatives and programs, aligning with the organization's vision and goals.
3.Collaborate with other board members to review and assess organizational performance, ensuring effective governance and compliance.
profile_positions.title: Advisory Board Member

profile_positions.description:
1.Create and optimize user-centered content, including UI copy, product descriptions, and user guides.
2.Conduct user research, including interviews, surveys, and usability testing, to gain insights and inform design decisions.
3.Collaborate with the design and development teams to ensure a seamless and cohesive user experience across digital products and platforms.
profile_positions.title: UX writing & UX research

profile_positions.description:
1.Engage and build relationships with the community, fostering a sense of belonging and encouraging active participation.
2.Develop and implement community engagement strategies, including social media campaigns, events, and online forums.
3.Act as a brand advocate, responding to inquiries, addressing concerns, and providing support to community members.
profile_positions.title: Community Manager

profile_positions.description:
1.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand user needs and design holistic service experiences that exceed customer expectations.
2.Create user-centered UX/UI designs, including wireframes, prototypes, and visual assets, ensuring a seamless and intuitive user interface.
3.Conduct user testing and iterate designs based on feedback, continuously improving the overall user experience.
profile_positions.title: Service Designer & UX/UI designer

profile_positions.description:
1.Develop and implement compliance programs and processes, ensuring adherence to relevant laws, regulations, and industry standards.
2.Conduct audits and risk assessments to identify compliance gaps and develop mitigation strategies.
3.Provide guidance and training to employees on compliance-related matters, fostering a culture of compliance within the organization.
profile_positions.title: Compliance Specialist

profile_positions.description:
1.Identify and pursue new business opportunities, including lead generation, prospecting, and building strategic partnerships.
2.Conduct market research and analysis to identify emerging trends and potential areas for growth.
3.Develop and deliver compelling sales pitches and presentations to secure new clients and drive revenue growth.
profile_positions.title: Bussiness development

profile_positions.description:
1.Apply design thinking principles to create innovative and user-centered legal products and services.
2.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define product requirements, develop prototypes, and iterate designs based on user feedback.
3.Conduct user testing and gather insights to inform design decisions and enhance the overall usability and functionality of the product.
profile_positions.title: Legal Designer / Product designer

profile_positions.description:
At the end of the program, students will be prepared to face, from a legal perspective, the different challenges posed by digital transformation cases and projects, Industry 4.0 technologies and blockchain-based systems. They will also be able to understand and use the tools derived from these technologies.

There will also be an introduction to the design and programming of Smart Contracts and the basics of programming in Python language will be studied. No previous programming knowledge or technical training is required for this section.
profile_positions.title: Senior Lecturer

profile_positions.location: Logroño, Autonomía de La Rioja, Spain
profile_positions.description:
1.Conduct user research and gather insights to inform the design of intuitive and user-friendly digital interfaces and services.
2.Collaborate with cross-functional teams to create wireframes, prototypes, and visual designs that enhance the user experience.
3.Continuously iterate and improve designs based on user feedback and usability testing to deliver high-quality user-centered solutions.
profile_positions.title: UX/UI designer & Service designer
